definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet

sentences.english: The television programmes from all over the world are bounced off satellites.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的電視節目都由通信衛星轉播。

sentences.english: The Intelsat IV communications satellite goes into commercial operation.
sentences.chinese: 國際衛星六號通信衛星投入商業使用。

sentences.english: Both have also contracted with outside companies to build telecom satellites and provide launch services.
sentences.chinese: 兩國都與外部公司簽約建立通信衛星並提供發射服務。

sentences.english: Transistors replaced the old vacuum tubes, and by the 1960s communications satellites eliminated the necessity of landlines.
sentences.chinese: 到了60年代，通信衛星又消除了對地面線路的需要。

sentences.english: The most common use of telecommunication satellites, however, has been for transmitting telephone calls.
sentences.chinese: 然而，通信衛星最普遍的用途是傳送電話。

definition: Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development of the PRC (MOHURD)/abbr. to 住建部[Zhu4 Jian4 bu4]
pinyin: Zhu4 fang2 he2 Cheng2 xiang1 Jian4 she4 bu4

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
